ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Derry City and Strabane District Council

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Derry City and Strabane District Council

TITLE.P: Tender for Stewarding and Crowd Management for Festivals and Events

SHORT_DESCR.P: Derry City and Strabane District Council (DCSDC) wish to invite written tenders from suitably experienced organisations for the provision of stewarding and crowd management for festival and events within the Council area from 1.4.2020 to 31.3.2023. DCSDC has established an annual public outdoor events programme.

TITLE.P: Lot 1: Events less than 1 000 Attendees (Smaller Events that May Require Support such as Fringe Events or Smaller Elements of Christmas Programming)

SHORT_DESCR.P: Derry City and Strabane District Council (DCSDC) wish to invite written tenders from suitably experienced organisations for the provision of stewarding and crowd management for festival and events within the Council area from 1.4.2020 to 31.3.2023. DCSDC has established an annual public outdoor events programme which includes a number of major events throughout the year including but not limited to:
— Foyle Maritime Festival (Biennial) June/July,
— Halloween Celebrations, Derry and Strabane October,
— Christmas Lights Switch On November,
— Christmas Events, Derry and Strabane November – End December,
— St Patrick’s Day/Spring Carnival, Derry and Strabane March,
— Summer Jamm, Strabane June,
— food events various.
Each festival varies in scale and dynamic with varying requirements for stewarding and crowd management subject to final programme. Services required include:
— security to secure the site for set up and take down where appropriate,
— overnight security where required,
— crowd management stewards relevant to audience numbers,
— provision of child welfare relevant to audience numbers,
— assist participants/performers as dictated by the final programme.

TITLE.P: Lot 4: Events 10 000 Attendees plus (Halloween Derry, Foyle Maritime Festival, Food Events)

PLACE.P: Derry City and Strabane District Council Offices.

INFO_ADD.P: Derry City and Strabane District Council elected members only.

This authority will incorporate a standstill period at the point information on the award of the contract is communicated to tenderers. That notification will provide full information on the award decision. The standstill period, which will be for a minimum of 10 calendar days, provides time for unsuccessful tenderers to challenge the award decision before the contract is entered into. The Public Contracts Regulations 2015 provide for aggrieved parties who have been harmed or are at risk of harm by a breach of the rules to take action in the High Court (England, Wales and Northern Ireland).
